Command.name: JavaScript
Command.label: 标准化所有注释
Command.tooltip: 修改所有注释到默认颜色和透明度

Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: this.syncAnnotScan(); var annots = this.getAnnots(); if (annots != null) { for (var i = annots.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (annots[i].type == "Highlight") { annots[i].opacity = 0.8; // [ "CMYK", 0,0,1,0 ] annots[i].strokeColor = color.yellow; } } }
